Entry.JapaneseText: バルカ地下通路
Entry.EnglishText: Balka Underpass

Entry.JapaneseText: バルカ地下通路
Entry.EnglishText: Balka Underpass

Entry.JapaneseText: このままでは 開きそうにないな……
Entry.EnglishText: At this rate, I don't think it's going to open...

Entry.JapaneseText: やっぱり…… 簡単には通れないよねぇ。
Entry.EnglishText: As I thought... It wasn't going to be easy.

Entry.JapaneseText: この部屋のどこかに 扉を開ける方法が 隠されているはずだ。
Entry.EnglishText: There must be a way to open the door hidden somewhere in this room.

Entry.JapaneseText: この部屋の中に、 扉を開く方法があるのは 間違いないんですけど……
Entry.EnglishText: I'm pretty sure there's a way to open the door hidden somewhere in this room.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……ったく。 どーすりゃ先に進めるんだよ！
Entry.EnglishText: ...Sheesh. How're we gonna get outta here!?

Entry.JapaneseText: このままじゃ 開きそうにないわね……
Entry.EnglishText: I don't think it's going to open like this...

Entry.JapaneseText: このままでは 開きそうにないな。
Entry.EnglishText: Looks like it's not going to open this way.

Entry.JapaneseText: この部屋のどこかに開ける 方法が隠されているはずだ。
Entry.EnglishText: There has to be a secret way to open up the door somewhere.

Entry.JapaneseText: このままでは 開きそうにないな……
Entry.EnglishText: At this rate, I don't think it's going to open...

Entry.JapaneseText: やっぱり…… 戻れないよねぇ。
Entry.EnglishText: As expected... There's no turning back.

Entry.JapaneseText: この部屋のどこかに 扉を開ける方法が 隠されているはずだ。
Entry.EnglishText: There must be a way to open the door hidden somewhere in this room.

Entry.JapaneseText: この部屋の中に 扉を開く方法があるのは 間違いないんですけど……
Entry.EnglishText: I'm pretty sure there's a way to open the door hidden somewhere in this room.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……ったく。 戻れもしないのかよ！
Entry.EnglishText: ...Darn. We can't even go back!?

Entry.JapaneseText: このままじゃ開きそうにないわね……
Entry.EnglishText: I don't think it's going to open like this...

Entry.JapaneseText: このままでは 開きそうにないな。
Entry.EnglishText: Looks like it's not going to open this way.

Entry.JapaneseText: この部屋のどこかに開ける 方法が隠されているはずだ。
Entry.EnglishText: There has to be a secret way to open up the door somewhere.

Entry.JapaneseText: おわっ！ 扉が閉まっちまったぞ！
Entry.EnglishText: Hey, what gives!? The door just shut itself!

Entry.JapaneseText: 侵入者対策ってヤツ？
Entry.EnglishText: Is it a defense mechanism?

Entry.JapaneseText: だろうな。だが、ここが王族の 脱出目的で作られたのであれば、 必ず元に戻す方法があるはずだ。
Entry.EnglishText: Most likely. However, given that this passageway was made for emergency evacuations of the royal family, there should be a way to reverse it.

Entry.JapaneseText: その方法を探すしかないな。
Entry.EnglishText: We'll have to find it then.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:00><scale:0140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:00><scale:0140>Would you like to rest? Yes No

Entry.JapaneseText: <Green><scale:0140><speed:00><font:80000002><Unk19:3404>が仲間になりました。
Entry.EnglishText: <Green><scale:0140><speed:00><Unk19:3404> joined the party.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Green><scale:0140><speed:00><font:80000002><Unk19:3410>が同行します。
Entry.EnglishText: <Green><scale:0140><speed:00><Unk19:3410> is now travelling with you.
